*.description: Prismatic is a Minecraft client which aims to improve the overall gaming experience and adding exclusive features such as AI anticheat, higher FPS, a quick select wheel, and built-in shaders.

/.description: Professional web development, Discord bots, and custom libraries are all available at epcr.dev

/download.title: Download
/download.description: Download the Prismatic client to recieve exclusive features such as AI cheat detection, FPS boost, a command selection wheel, and more.
